title: Eva Marie Saint: At 89, 'You Have More To Give'
teaser: On The Waterfront turns 60 this year. It was the film that introduced Eva Marie Saint to the world. NPR's Scott Simon talks with the 89-year-old movie legend, who won an Oscar for her role.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
